#include <stdio.h>
int main (void)
{
    int x, a, b, c, d;
        scanf ("%d", &x);
        for (x; x > 0; --x)
        {
                scanf ("%d%d%d", &a, &b, &c);
                d = c % (a + b);
                if (d == 0 || d > a)
                        printf ("Anish\n");
                else 
                        printf ("Aman\n");
        }
        return 0;
}
